body_html:
I got the same error! help!!
sys
Ubuntu x64 14.04
bazel:0.7.0
tf:1.4
cuda:8
java:8

error log
INFO: Found 1 target...
ERROR: /home/mt-srcb/phzhang/DLplatform/tensorflow-1.4.0/tensorflow/core/BUILD:993:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite' failed (Exit 1).
In file included from ./third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor:1:0,
from ./tensorflow/core/kernels/conv_2d.h:19,
from tensorflow/core/kernels/pooling_ops_common.cc:24:
external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor:84:26: fatal error: cuda_runtime.h: No such file or directory
#include <cuda_runtime.h>
^
compilation terminated.
Target //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.

body:
I got the same error! help!!
**sys**
Ubuntu x64 14.04
bazel:0.7.0
tf:1.4
cuda:8
java:8


**error log**
INFO: Found 1 target...
ERROR: /home/mt-srcb/phzhang/DLplatform/tensorflow-1.4.0/tensorflow/core/BUILD:993:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite' failed (Exit 1).
In file included from ./third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor:1:0,
                 from ./tensorflow/core/kernels/conv_2d.h:19,
                 from tensorflow/core/kernels/pooling_ops_common.cc:24:
external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor:84:26: fatal error: cuda_runtime.h: No such file or directory
 #include <cuda_runtime.h>
                          ^
compilation terminated.
Target //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
